## ConstantTextureCubeNode.getSerializationCls() method

Gets the serialization descriptor for this node type

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getSerializationCls(): SerializableClass;
```
**Returns:**

[SerializableClass](doc/markdown/./scene.serializableclass.md)

Serialization class descriptor

## Remarks

Only accepts DDS format, which is the standard format for cubemaps. Includes validation to ensure the loaded texture is actually a cubemap.
